sense.def:
To collapse
pomeni nenadoma pasti ali se sesesti. Kadar človek
collapses
, nenadoma pade na tla, ker je bolan ali utrujen.

seg.quote: These flimsy houses are liable to collapse in a heavy storm.
As we walked into the hotel, Jane collapsed.
The collapse of buildings trapped thousands of people.
Upon her collapse she was rushed to hospital.

sense.def:
Kadar neki sistem ali ustanova
collapses
, popolnoma in nenadoma propade.

seg.quote: ...a company on the verge of collapse.
